output_list.reason: The mint function does not check for overflow, allowing the total supply to be set to any arbitrary value.
The migrate function does not check for overflow, allowing users to migrate an arbitrary large amount of tokens.
The buyTokens function does not check for overflow, allowing users to buy an arbitrary large amount of tokens.
The creditJackpotTokens function does not check for overflow, allowing users to receive an arbitrary large amount of tokens.
The setMigrationAgent function allows any user to set the migrationAgent, granting it to any address, including attackers, allowing them to exploit the migrate function.
